name: d20SRD.org - Remove Header
description: This style completely removes the torn-paper header on every page on d20SRD.org
additional_info: To get this style to work in Google Chrome, click the "Install with Stylish" button on this page. The Chrome extension will automatically strip the @-moz-document domain code (Firefox specific) and make the style only apply to the domain: www.d20srd.org
